alert.note: Alert for Kanabec; Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 10:32AM CDT until May 12 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kanabec County in east central Minnesota... Northern Mille Lacs County in east central Minnesota... East central Morrison County in central Minnesota... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1032 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lastrup, or 17 miles east of Little Falls, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Onamia and Vineland around 1050 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Isle and Wahkon. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
